languages.text: {n}Тяжелый вздох повисает в воздухе.{/n} "Мы с тобой разнимся. Твой путь — управлять и созидать, мой же — разрушать и гнать добычу. Таков замысел Всеотца, и в нем моя смерть на поле битвы есть событие ожидаемое и радостное, твоя же — скорбное, преждевременное и вредное для людей".

{n}Ulfar heaves a sigh, which seems to hang in the air between you.{/n} "You and I are different. Your way is to rule and build, while mine is to destroy and chase down prey. Such is the Allfather's plan, and in that plan, my death on the battlefield is an expected and joyous event, while your death would be premature, sorrowful, and damaging to many other lives."
languages.original_text: {n}Тяжелый вздох повисает в воздухе.{/n} "Мы с тобой разнимся. Твой путь — управлять и созидать, мой же — разрушать и гнать добычу. Таков замысел Всеотца, и в нем моя смерть на поле битвы есть событие ожидаемое и радостное, твоя же — скорбное, преждевременное и вредное для людей".

Such is the Allfather's plan, and in that plan, my death on the battlefield is an expected and joyous event, while your death would be premature, sorrowful, and damaging to many other lives."

Such is the Allfather's plan, and in that plan, my death on the battlefield is an expected and joyous event, while your death would be premature, sorrowful, and damaging to many other lives."

languages.text: {n}乌尔法叹了口气，沉重的气息似乎徘徊在你们两人之间。{/n}“你和我不一样。你的命运是统治、建设你的王朝，而我的命运则是追捕猎物、屠戮敌人，这便是全父对我们的安排。在祂的安排中，若是我死在了战场上，那是件意料之中的幸事，可如果你不幸身亡，那不仅令人扼腕，还会让许多人落入危险之中。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar heaves a sigh, which seems to hang in the air between you.{/n} "You and I are different. Your way is to rule and build, while mine is to destroy and chase down prey. Such is the Allfather's plan, and in that plan, my death on the battlefield is an expected and joyous event, while your death would be premature, sorrowful, and damaging to many other lives."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法叹了口气，沉重的气息似乎徘徊在你们两人之间。{/n}“你和我不一样。你的命运是统治、建设你的王朝，而我的命运则是追捕猎物、屠戮敌人，这便是全父对我们的安排。在祂的安排中，若是我死在了战场上，那是件意料之中的幸事，可如果你不幸身亡，那不仅令人扼腕，还会让许多人落入危险之中。”
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}ウルファーがため息をつくと、吐いた息があなたとの間で宙を漂うように感じられる。{/n}「俺とお前は違う。お前の道は統治して築く道だが、俺は壊して獲物を追い詰める道だ。これは全知の父の計画、そこでは俺が戦場で死ぬことが喜ばしい出来事として期待されてるわけだ。ところが、お前の死は他の大勢の人生には早すぎて痛ましい損失になる」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar heaves a sigh, which seems to hang in the air between you.{/n} "You and I are different. Your way is to rule and build, while mine is to destroy and chase down prey. Such is the Allfather's plan, and in that plan, my death on the battlefield is an expected and joyous event, while your death would be premature, sorrowful, and damaging to many other lives."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーがため息をつくと、吐いた息があなたとの間で宙を漂うように感じられる。{/n}「俺とお前は違う。お前の道は統治して築く道だが、俺は壊して獲物を追い詰める道だ。これは全知の父の計画、そこでは俺が戦場で死ぬことが喜ばしい出来事として期待されてるわけだ。ところが、お前の死は他の大勢の人生には早すぎて痛ましい損失になる」
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}Ulfar suelta un profundo suspiro que parece colgar del aire que os separa.{/n} «Somos diferentes: a usted le corresponde gobernar y construir, mientras que a mí me corresponde destruir y dar caza a presas. Ese es el plan del Padre de todas las cosas, y en ese plan mi muerte en combate es un suceso previsible y feliz, mientras que su muerte sería un suceso prematuro, trágico y dañino para muchas otras vidas».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar heaves a sigh, which seems to hang in the air between you.{/n} "You and I are different. Your way is to rule and build, while mine is to destroy and chase down prey. Such is the Allfather's plan, and in that plan, my death on the battlefield is an expected and joyous event, while your death would be premature, sorrowful, and damaging to many other lives."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar suelta un profundo suspiro que parece colgar del aire que os separa.{/n} «Somos diferentes: a usted le corresponde gobernar y construir, mientras que a mí me corresponde destruir y dar caza a presas. Ese es el plan del Padre de todas las cosas, y en ese plan mi muerte en combate es un suceso previsible y feliz, mientras que su muerte sería un suceso prematuro, trágico y dañino para muchas otras vidas».
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}Ulfar pousse un long soupir.{/n} « Nous sommes différents, vous et moi. Votre destin est de régner et de bâtir ; le mien est de détruire et de pourchasser mes proies. Telle est ma place dans le dessein du Père de Tous, et il est écrit que ma mort sur le champ de bataille sera un évènement joyeux, tandis que la vôtre serait prématurée, douloureuse et préjudiciable à bien des gens. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar heaves a sigh, which seems to hang in the air between you.{/n} "You and I are different. Your way is to rule and build, while mine is to destroy and chase down prey. Such is the Allfather's plan, and in that plan, my death on the battlefield is an expected and joyous event, while your death would be premature, sorrowful, and damaging to many other lives."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar pousse un long soupir.{/n} « Nous sommes différents, vous et moi. Votre destin est de régner et de bâtir ; le mien est de détruire et de pourchasser mes proies. Telle est ma place dans le dessein du Père de Tous, et il est écrit que ma mort sur le champ de bataille sera un évènement joyeux, tandis que la vôtre serait prématurée, douloureuse et préjudiciable à bien des gens. »
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}Ulfar entfährt ein Seufzen, das in der Luft zwischen euch hängenzubleiben scheint.{/n} "Ihr und ich sind verschieden. Ihr herrscht und baut auf, ich zerstöre und jage Beute. So lautet der Plan des Allvaters, und in dessen Rahmen ist mein Tod auf dem Schlachtfeld ein erwartetes und freudvolles Ereignis, wohingegen Euer Tod vorzeitig, traurig und von Nachteil für viele andere Leben wäre."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar heaves a sigh, which seems to hang in the air between you.{/n} "You and I are different. Your way is to rule and build, while mine is to destroy and chase down prey. Such is the Allfather's plan, and in that plan, my death on the battlefield is an expected and joyous event, while your death would be premature, sorrowful, and damaging to many other lives."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar entfährt ein Seufzen, das in der Luft zwischen euch hängenzubleiben scheint.{/n} "Ihr und ich sind verschieden. Ihr herrscht und baut auf, ich zerstöre und jage Beute. So lautet der Plan des Allvaters, und in dessen Rahmen ist mein Tod auf dem Schlachtfeld ein erwartetes und freudvolles Ereignis, wohingegen Euer Tod vorzeitig, traurig und von Nachteil für viele andere Leben wäre."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, ikinizin arasındaki havayı ısıtan bir nefes veriyor.{/n} "İkimiz çok farklıyız. Senin yolun yönetip inşa etmekten geçiyor, benimkiyse yok edip avlanmaktan. Yücebaba'nın planı böyle. O planda benim savaşta ölmeme şaşılmaz, aksine kutlanır. Senin ölümün ise erken, acı dolu ve birçok cana zarar olarak dönecek bir durum olurdu."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar heaves a sigh, which seems to hang in the air between you.{/n} "You and I are different. Your way is to rule and build, while mine is to destroy and chase down prey. Such is the Allfather's plan, and in that plan, my death on the battlefield is an expected and joyous event, while your death would be premature, sorrowful, and damaging to many other lives."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, ikinizin arasında asılı kalan bir nefes veriyor.{/n} "Seninle ben farklıyız. Senin yolun yönetmekten ve inşa etmekten geçiyor, benimkiyse yok etmekten ve avlanmaktan. Yücebaba'nın planı böyle. O planda benim savaşta ölmeme şaşılmaz, aksine kutlanır. Senin ölümün ise erken, acıyla dolu ve birçok hayata zarar verecek bir durum olurdu."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked
